frontMatter.title: Week 1 Results
frontMatter.summary: A recap of the first week of the season for Navan teams, highlighting lessons learned and future determination after challenging matches.

prev.title: Thursday Badminton Fun!
prev.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night from 9pm to 11pm. Open to all skill levels with courts for team games and open play.
